entry.title: Russian Forces Close In on Ukraine's Capital, Bombing Intensifies
entry.content: Russian forces moved by air and land to attack Kyiv, while the capitalâ€™s defenders dug into positions along its forested edge and prepared to blow up bridges. The Kremlin said it agreed to talks with Kyiv.

entry.title: Once a Comic, Ukrainian President Transforms Into Wartime Leader
entry.content: Volodymyr Zelensky took office in 2019 calling for peace. Now, he is winning plaudits for his fortitude amid a full-scale Russian invasion.
